Government and local councils should no longer be able to fund religious buildings/schools without having  places for all religions.  I am personally sick of this country segregation and lack of understanding. I think we need more universal religious buildings to integrate religions.

For example instead of building a mosque, church or synagogue. We build what is known as the house of one. http://house-of-one.org/en/idea

Please support this to bring the British people all together and make this country proud.
